resources.string:
Now a days off and on social media fake news consisting of dotored text articles or photoshoped images have been a real issue. This app will help you navigate the proverbial mine field that have become our social media feed. 
 
 This will help you in two ways 
 

a) You can give it online news article to process and based it will try to categorize the article with 95% accuracy based upon nlp, semantic and emotional analysis. 
 

b) give it a image it will perform error level analysis and show you result which will hint possible photoshop which you can observe by seesing changes in the contrast
Guru Meditating: Please wait while we process and get back to you
